transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, madam, good evening.
Customer: Good evening, sir, kaun?
Executive: Imran baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se. Aap SK Sir Clips se baat kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Ji sir, boliye.
Executive: Haan ji, madam, baat hua tha na apna sir meeting ke liye kiye the, 5:00 baje ke aas pass lagana.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: IndiaMART se baat kar raha tha main.
Customer: Ji sir, ek minute main abhi aapse baat karati hoon.
Executive: Haan, baat karaiye.
Customer: Hello, excuse me sir, aapke liye call hai IndiaMART se.
(silence)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, madam, good evening.
Customer: Hello, main madam nahi hoon, sir hoon.
Executive: Achcha, sorry, Gagan ji baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan ji sir, main keh raha tha sir ki woh discuss hua tha aapke saath. Hai na, IndiaMART service ko leke sir. Toh is video meeting ke liye maine aapse request kiya tha. Toh possible hai toh ek baar hum connect kar sakte hain over the video meeting?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: So that actually maine video meeting mein bulane ka purpose yeh tha sir, kyunki kuch product ka jo mapping vagera tha na aapka, jiska mujhe mapping vagera bhi correct karana tha sir. Jaise ek product bhi mujhe dikh raha tha Sir Clips karke mein sir. Yeh bhi product aapke catalog pe add nahi tha sir. Toh isko bhi main add karwa deta aur kuch product ke primary mapping bhi vagera bhi main correct karwa deta. So that jo problem aapko yeh aa rahi hai na, woh problem na aati. Saath hi saath ek baar hum buy leads ko leke bhi discuss kar lete ki kya aapke hum help kar sakte hain.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Toh main abhi aapko video meeting share kar raha hoon aapke registered mail ID pe. Ek baar aap apna mail ID open kar lijiyega. Main aapko mail ID bhi confirm kar raha hoon. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji sir. Hello. Ek second sir.
Executive: Haan, maine mail ID aap ek baar apna open kar lijiye. IndiaMART ka jo registered mail ID hai aapka. Mail ID confirm karu aapke saath?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Just ek minute.
(silence)
Executive: Yeh aap logon ne jo mail ID yahan pe register kar rakha hai, contractor kiransingh63@gmail.com.
Customer: Sir, is par mat kijiye. Mera secondary email hai na, us pe kijiye. Meera Devi ke naam se hai jo.
Executive: Secondary email ID toh aise toh dikh nahi raha hai. Aap mujhe ek kaam kijiye, secondary email ID kya aap mujhe text kar denge ya phir mujhe bata denge main uske according phir bhej deta hoon.
Customer: Dikh nahi raha. Ek minute, ek minute, ek minute. Just main isko pehle meeting ko cancel karne dijiye. Uske baad main aapse mangta hoon, ek minute.
Customer: Yes sir.
(silence)
Executive: Haan, mujhe bataiye mail ID bataiye.
Customer: Sir, small letters mein pehle likhiye Meera Devi.
Executive: Sorry, Meera Devi?
Customer: Haan, small letters mein.
Executive: Small letter pe likh diya maine Meera Devi, M I R A D E V I. Theek hai?
Customer: M double E R A.
Executive: M double, M double E karna hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, M double E R A D ek minute sir, ruk jaiye. M double E R A D E V I. Meera Devi small letter pe likh liya, uske baad?
Customer: Haan, sir, phir 7139.
Executive: 7139.
Customer: @gmail.com.
Executive: @gmail.com.
Executive: Meera, yeh sir, sir aa hi nahi raha hai. Meera.
Executive: Meera Devi.
Executive: 7139@gmail.com. Yahi keh rahe ho na aap?
Customer: Haan sir.
(silence)
Executive: Yeh mail ID accept kyun nahi kar raha hai sir?
Executive: Ek baar main, ek baar mujhe spelling ek baar repeat karoge sir aap? Small letter mein aapne sara bola hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: 7139, yes sir. Meera Devi 7139. Devi mein D E V I hai na sir aapka?
Customer: Haan, D E V I.
Executive: Theek hai. V for Vellore?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Nahi le raha hai sir yeh mail ID. This enter a invalid email address bata raha hai baar baar.
Customer: Ek second sir, abhi accept karna hai. Main aapko email ID dikhai deta hoon.
Executive: Bataiye.
(silence)
Customer: Dekhna sir, maine bheja hai, text gaya hai kya? Hello?
Customer: Haan, sir, ek second dikha raha hoon. Ek baar maine refresh karke bheja hai phir se. Dekhna ek baar gaya hai kya aapke paas? Meera Devi wale ko open kijiye mail ID.
(silence)
Customer: Haan sir, abhi toh aaya nahi hai sir.
Executive: Shayad mere khayal se usi pe ja raha hai contractor pe. Koi dusra mail ID available hoga kya aapke paas?
Customer: Haan hai sir.
Executive: Toh dusra mail ID bata dijiye sir ek baar yeh nahi le raha hai toh main us pe kar deta hoon aapko.
Customer: Haan toh sir likhiye.
Executive: Ek minute, ek minute sir, main isko cancel karne dijiye phir se.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Service aap hi use karte hain sir?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh woh aapke father ka number primary number mein hai kya?
Customer: Haan, woh father ka primary number hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Maine pehle unko laga diya tha by mistake toh unhone bola ki Gagan ji se hi aap baat kijiye. Haan bataiye sir mail ID.
Customer: Sir, small letter mein PC likhiye.
Executive: Kya sir? P.
Customer: P aur C small letters mein.
Executive: Haan, P likh diya maine. Aur phir C.
Customer: PC.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uske baad sir?
Customer: 2366.
Executive: 2366.
Customer: 165.
Executive: 165.
Customer: @gmail.com.
Executive: Sirf small letter mein PC2366165@gmail.com. Yahi keh rahe ho aap?
Customer: Haan.
(silence)
Executive: Haan check kijiye sir mail ID matlab humne bhej diya hai meeting ka link aapke paas.
Customer: Ek second sir abhi check kar raha hoon.
(silence)
Customer: Haan sir aaya hai.
Executive: Join kijiye aap.
Customer: Haan join toh kar raha par sir mic nahi hai.
Executive: WhatsApp call pe baat kar lenge?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: WhatsApp call pe baat kar lenge aur is pe aap join kar lijiye meeting.
Customer: Haan sir. Join toh kar liya.
Executive: Theek hai, main WhatsApp call kar raha hoon, theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to join meeting due to mic issue.

- Executive unable to send meeting link to customer.



Resolution:

- Executive resent meeting link to alternate email.

- Executive to connect via WhatsApp call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect via WhatsApp call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting, email, technical issue, whatsapp
